name: AmbientRainSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open ambient rain sounds”
”Alexa ask ambient rain sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient rain sounds
des: Let the sounds of an ambient rain raging outside thrust you into a deep sleep. Ambient Rain Sounds is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Ambient Rain Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
